dao

Interface TimetableDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GenericDAO<java.lang.Integer,Timetable>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TimetableDAOImpl

    public interface TimetableDAO
extends GenericDAO<java.lang.Integer,Timetable>
    DAO for Timetable Entity.
